6.7.6 Miscellaneous OLE-SERVER module classes and functions

istream-read-int16

Function

Signature

istream-read-int16 stream => value

Arguments

stream
An instance of <storage-istream>.

Values

value
An instance of <integer>.

Library

OLE-Server

Module

OLE-Server

Description

Read a value written by istream-write-int16.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
